sqlMap.statement: create table if not exists $tableName$ ( id int(11) not null AUTO_INCREMENT primary key, log_type int(11) not null default -100, log_time bigint not null, region_id int(11) , server_id int(11) , account_id varchar(128), account_name varchar(128), char_id varchar(128), char_name varchar(128), level int(11) , alliance_id int(11) , vip_level int(11) , reason int(11) , scene_id varchar(256), x int(11) , y int(11) , param varchar(512), building_id int(11) , building_name varchar(256), up_level_time bigint , interval_time bigint , createTime bigint not null ,key account_id (account_id) ,key account_name (account_name) ,key char_id (char_id) ,key char_name (char_name) )ENGINE = MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8
